text: During World War II, Romania started neutral. Romania then signed a pact with Adolf Hitler and Germany and joined the axis powers November 23 1940. On June 22, 1941, Romanian troops took part in the aggression against the Soviet Union Where they saw actions in Odesa and Stalingrad. In March-August 1944 the Soviets invaded and Romania changed sides on August 23 1944. the Romanian army fought with the Soviets where they saw action in Hungary and Czechoslovakia. == References == World War II Category:World War II
title: Romania in World War II
